sense.gloss: sex aids (e.g. dildos, pornographic books, erotic woodblock prints, etc.)
to be dumbfounded, to be flabbergasted
to laugh, to break into laughter, to be made to laugh
to be funny, to be laughable, to make one laugh, to make one smile
to make (someone) laugh, to set to laughing

sdata.j: 「ちがうちがう↑僕↑↓ぼく↓らは↑求↑↓もと↓めてる↑笑顔↑↓えがお↓はあんなじゃない」　それは『嗤い』もしくは『↑嘲笑↑↓ちょうしょう↓』。
sdata.e: No, no! That isn't the smiling face we are looking for. It was a 'smirk' either that or a 'sneer'.

sdata.j: ベェーだっ！↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓のことを嗤った↑罰↑↓ばっ↓よ！
sdata.e: Pfft! That's what you get for laughing at a girl!

sdata.j: ベェーだっ！↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓のことを嗤った↑罰↑↓ばっ↓よ！
sdata.e: Pfft! That's your punishment for laughing at a girl!

words.gloss: to laugh, to break into laughter, to be made to laugh
